resources.string: Connect internet via USB connection. With this, your mobile device can share your PC\'s (wired) network and access to internet via USB cable. \nIs it MOBILE? anyway I need it.

Usage: 
	0. enable USB tether of your device. 
	1. enter IP address of USB interface of PC. 
	 (Dynamic by default.) 
	2. enter DNS address. 
	 (default is last DNS using by device.) 

on PC side: 
	1. setup USB interface. (Dynamic) 
	2. enable internet share. 
	 (on linux, enable IP Forward/Masquerade.) 
	 $ echo 1 |sudo tee /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward 
	 $ sudo iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE 

Known Problems: 
	* cannot download apps from market. 
	 (but market searching is working.) 
	* can i determind peer address automatically?
